text: Pericles, Prince of Tyre is a play by William Shakespeare. It is a comedy. Shakespeare's source was The Patterne of Painefull Adventures (1576) by Lawrence Twine. Pericles, Prince of Tyre was probably first acted between 1608 and 1609. It was probably first printed in quarto form in 1609.Pericles, Prince of Tyre ==References== Category:Plays by William Shakespeare Category:1600s plays
title: Pericles, Prince of Tyre
